title: InterUnitDomainRelationship
description: Defines a relationship between organisation units in relation to a specific domain entity.

id.description: Unique identifier for the inter-unit domain relationship.

domainEntityType.description: The type of domain entity the relationship applies to.

domainEntityId.description: Identifier of the domain entity (e.g., capability ID, information asset ID).

relationshipType.description: The type of relationship the unit has to the domain entity.

organisationUnitId.description: Identifier of the organisation unit participating in the relationship.

relationshipStrength.description: Numeric representation (1â€“5) of the strength of the relationship between the organisation unit and the domain entity.

notes.description: Optional free-text field for explanatory comments.
